Weapon.Name: Twilight's Edge
Weapon.Description: A sword bathed in the essence of twilight, its blade shifts colors with the sky.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you swing the sword, the air chills, and time seems to slow around your foe.

Weapon.Name: Starfall Dagger
Weapon.Description: A dagger forged from a meteorite, containing the power of the cosmos within.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Chance to instantly eliminate enemies with less than 10% health
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift stab, the power of the stars is unleashed upon your enemy.

Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Void
Weapon.Description: A staff that whispers with voices from the void, channeling ancient, forgotten powers.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Summons a void entity to fight alongside for 10 seconds
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The ground trembles as an entity from the void answers your call, ravaging your foes.
